message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_PERSON
message.locale: A Person must be specified when creating a linked Citizen Workspace account.

message.name: ERR_USERNAME_TOO_SHORT
message.locale: The user name must be at least %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_USERNAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The user name can be at most %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_FIRSTNAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The first name can be at most %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_LASTNAME_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The last name can be at most %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_SECURITY_QUESTION
message.locale: Security question is mandatory. Please select a security question.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_ANSWER
message.locale: You must provide an answer for the selected security question.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS
message.locale: You must accept the terms and conditions.

message.name: ERR_PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT
message.locale: The password must be at least %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_PASSWORD_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The password can be at most %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_PASSWORD_MIN_SPECIAL_CHARS
message.locale: The password must contain at least %1n number(s) and/or special characters.

message.name: ERR_CONCERN_ROLE_DOES_NOT_HAVE_LINKED_CW_ACCOUNT
message.locale: The ConcernRole with name %1s does not have a linked Citizen Workspace account.
